segments.text: Did you open it before we left ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? It's winter . Why would I open it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Wait . Is this yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No ! Oh , my God ! Someone has broken into the house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks that way . That's probably why the door wasn't locked when we came in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I locked it when I left though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but the robber broke in.Then , when he left , he left through the door . So it wasn't locked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care about that , Allen ! What did he steal ? That's the question !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And your stereo too . So what did he steal ? We have to go look upstairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what if someone's still up there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think there will be . He left through the door , remember ?
segments.speaker: S2
